DOC.brief_title: An Intervention Increase Physical Activity Among African American Women
DOC.detailed_description: Sedentary lifestyle common among old adult United States , especially among minority woman . Regular physical activity old adult show prevent fall , maintain functional status , prevent dementia osteoporosis , decrease mortality . A review literature show current research approach use exercise class mean behavior change ineffective produce long-term sustainable improvement . This study test culturally appropriate behavior modification intervention use 1 ) group prayer , 2 ) development social support mutual responsibility exercise , 3 ) group problem solve activity increase aerobic strength-related activity among old African American woman . Participants randomize intervention arm receive 45-minute curriculum session 45 minute exercise class , randomize control arm receive 45 minute session interactive lecture unrelated health topic along 45 minute exercise class . The exercise class include aerobic exercise strength train use hand-held weight . Data collect pedometer worn participant , well questionnaires intervention . Blood pressure , weight , cholesterol measure intervention .
